snippet: Jim Lovell, 58, a consultant traveling to Manhattan to set up the Christmas tree in Rockefeller Center, and Kisook Ahn, 35, a nurse, were among four people killed in the train derailment.
abstract: Jim Lovell, Donna L Smith, Kisook Ahn and James M Ferrari are identified as the four passengers killed when a southbound Metro-North Hudson line train derailed in the Bronx.

liam K. Rashbaum, Julie
Turkewitz, and Alex Vadu-
kul.

lead_paragraph: Jim Lovell, 58, a consultant traveling to Manhattan to set up the Christmas tree in Rockefeller Center, and Kisook Ahn, 35, a nurse, were among four people killed in the train derailment.

headline.main: Man Going to Set Up Rockefeller Center Tree, a Nurse and a Paralegal Are Among the Dead
headline.print_headline: Man Going to Set Up Rockefeller Center Tree, A Nurse and a Paralegal Are Among the Dead
